metadata.description: Username for the Virtual Machine.

Name for FortiGate virtual appliances (A & B will be appended to the end of each respectively).
Identifies whether to to use PAYG (on demand licensing) or BYOL license model (where license is purchased separately)
Only 6.0.0 has the A/P HA feature currently

Identify if to use a public IP, and if so whether it's new

osProfile.customData:
[base64(concat('config system global
 set admin-sport 8443
 end
 config router static
 edit 1
 set gateway ', variables('sn1GatewayIP'), '
 set device port1
 next
 edit 2
 set dst ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefix'), '
 set gateway ', variables('sn2GatewayIP'), '
 set device port2
 next
 edit 3
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port2
 set gateway ', variables ('sn2GatewayIP'), '
 next
edit 4
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port1
 set gateway ', variables ('sn1GatewayIP'), '
 next
 end
 config system probe-response
 set http-probe-value OK
 set mode http-probe
 end
 config system interface
 edit port1
 set mode static
 set ip ',  variables('sn1IPfg1'), '/', variables('sn1CIDRmask'), '
 set description external
 set allowaccess probe-response
 next
 edit port2
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn2IPfg1'), '/', variables('sn2CIDRmask'), '
 set description internal
 set allowaccess probe-response
 next
 edit port3
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn3IPfg1'), '/', variables('sn3CIDRmask'), '
 set description hasyncport
 next
 edit port4
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn4IPfg1'), '/', variables('sn4CIDRmask'), '
 set description management
 set allowaccess ping https ssh ftm
 next
 end
 config system ha
 set group-name AzureHA
 set mode a-p
 set hbdev port3 100
 set session-pickup enable
 set session-pickup-connectionless enable
 set ha-mgmt-status enable
 config ha-mgmt-interfaces
 edit 1
 set interface port4
 set gateway ', variables('sn4GatewayIP'),'
 next
 end
 set override disable
 set priority 255
 set unicast-hb enable
 set unicast-hb-peerip ', variables('sn3IPfg2'), '
 end'))]

[base64(concat('config system global
 set admin-sport 8443
 end
 config router static
 edit 1
 set gateway ', variables('sn1GatewayIP'), '
 set device port1
 next
 edit 2
 set dst ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefix'), '
 set gateway ', variables('sn2GatewayIP'), '
 set device port2
 next
 edit 3
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port2
 set gateway ', variables ('sn2GatewayIP'), '
 next
edit 4
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port1
 set gateway ', variables ('sn1GatewayIP'), '
 next
 end
 config system probe-response
 set http-probe-value OK
 set mode http-probe
 end
 config system interface
 edit port1
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn1IPfg2'), '/', variables('sn1CIDRmask'), '
 set description external
 set allowaccess probe-response
 next
 edit port2
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn2IPfg2'), '/', variables('sn2CIDRmask'), '
 set description internal
 set allowaccess probe-response
 next
 edit port3
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn3IPfg2'), '/', variables('sn3CIDRmask'), '
 set description hasyncport
 next
 edit port4
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn4IPfg2'), '/', variables('sn4CIDRmask'), '
 set description management
 set allowaccess ping https ssh ftm
 next
 end
 config system ha
 set group-name AzureHA
 set mode a-p
 set hbdev port3 100
 set session-pickup enable
 set session-pickup-connectionless enable
 set ha-mgmt-status enable
 config ha-mgmt-interfaces
 edit 1
 set interface port4
 set gateway ', variables('sn4GatewayIP'),'
 next
 end
 set override disable
 set priority 1
 set unicast-hb enable
 set unicast-hb-peerip ', variables('sn3IPfg1'), '
 end'))]
